about_the_game:
Lord of Pain Pack:

  • Large mount Demon Dog.
  • Decorated Black Lord's Cloak with pockets (+5 slots).
  • Lord's helmet (decoration).
  • Title Lord of Pain.
  • Unique dominium skin - Gargoyle Statue.
  • Pet - A bat with a lantern that lights the way.
  • Character portrait - Lord.
  • Epic portrait frame.
  • Special role Lord of Pain with access to closed chats in the of players.

*After purchase, you need to re-enter the game to add all rewards to your account.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom II X4 with at least 2,5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 460/Radeon HD 5850/Intel HD 4600 with at least 1024 MB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Phenom II X6 with at least 3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660/Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Italian, Ukrainian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Korean
